page.title: 02Houses in Abbotsley
page.content: These are the different houses in Abbotsley:bungalows,caravans,council houses,detached houses,farm houses, old peoples homes,semi detached, terraced,thatched cottages,detached cottages.Our class had different parts of the village.The whole class found 32 bungalows,4 caravans,19 council houses,49 detached houses,6 farm houses,2 old peoples bungalows 6 semi detached,13 terraced,14 thatched cottages,4 detached cottages.Some of the cottages are over 200 years old! At the top of the Green there was a shop and post office but the owners have now left and no one in the village seems interested in opening a new one.The oldest cottages are about 300 years old.
